net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario

Class AbstractScenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.scenario.AbstractScenario
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IConfigure, IScenario, JCLAL
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoolBasedSamplingScenario, StreamBasedSelectiveSamplingScenario

    public abstract class AbstractScenario
extends Object
implements IScenario, IConfigure
    Abstract class for active learning scenario. Every AL scenario must extend this class.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
